remarks: Lemma for ~ itgmulc2 : positive real case.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Aug-2014.)
statement:
itgmulc2.1 $e |- ( ph -> C e. CC ) $.
itgmulc2.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> B e. V ) $.
itgmulc2.3 $e |- ( ph -> ( x e. A |-> B ) e. L^1 ) $.
itgmulc2.4 $e |- ( ph -> C e. RR ) $.
itgmulc2.5 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> B e. RR ) $.
itgmulc2.6 $e |- ( ph -> 0 <_ C ) $.
itgmulc2.7 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> 0 <_ B ) $.
itgmulc2lem1 $p |- ( ph -> ( C x. S. A B _d x ) = S. A ( C x. B ) _d x ) $.
$d A x $.
$d C x $.
$d V x $.
$d ph x $.
